description:
You might remember a bit of a culture war flaring up around gas stoves, and it turns out there's some RELEVANT SCIENTIFIC LITERATURE we can consult.
Full video on our channel (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hX2aZUav-54)
And don’t forget to check out our friends over at @HotAndToxic   - and you can learn all about the toxins in natural gas here: https://hotandtoxic.com/#facts
title: Gas Stoves Are Bad For Your Health
